data.text: @WorldBank Don’t gamble your money trying to trade yourself invest with trading experts,then sit back and enjoy your profits we’re reliable crypto trading company with over 8 years of professionalism, visit our website for a well detailed info 👉 https://t.co/1S8y5Ptekl

@WorldBank We worked on an emergency Covid relief program funded by the World Bank in Afghanistan & we haven’t received our salaries since July. We all have families & every day goes hard on us. There were many women among us. Are we different from the Ukrainians? #WorldBankPayOurSalaries
